sections.title: Dragon Disciple (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Dragon Disciple class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Dragon disciples gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: At indicated levels, dragon disciple gains new spells per day as if gaining a level in a previous arcane spellcasting class, but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Blood of Dragons (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Adds dragon disciple level to sorcerer levels for bloodline powers, or grants draconic bloodline powers if no sorcerer levels exist.

sections.title: Natural Armor Increase (Ex) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Gains stacking increases to natural armor at 1st, 4th, and 7th level as skin thickens and takes on draconic aspects.

sections.title: Ability Boost (Ex) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Ability scores increase at certain levels as shown on the class table, stacking and gained as through level advancement.

sections.title: Bloodline Feat (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Receives bonus feats from the draconic bloodline feat list at 2nd level and every three levels thereafter.

sections.title: Dragon Bite (Ex) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Gains a primary bite attack when bloodline claws are active, dealing 1d6 damage plus Strength modifier, and energy damage at 6th level.

sections.title: Breath Weapon (Su) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Gains breath weapon bloodline power at 3rd level regardless of actual bloodline level, with additional daily use once bloodline level catches up.

sections.title: Blindsense (Ex) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Gains blindsense 30 feet at 5th level (60 feet at 10th level), allowing detection of creatures without sight but retaining concealment mechanics.

sections.title: Dragon Form (Sp) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Can transform into dragon form as form of the dragon I at 7th level, upgrading to form of the dragon II with twice daily use at 10th level.

sections.title: Wings (Su) (Dragon Disciple)
sections.description: Gains wings bloodline power at 9th level regardless of bloodline level, with flight speed increasing to 90 feet once bloodline level catches up.
